Localization.Name: Gallenson Tactical Systems
Localization.Description: This Earth-based company is responsible for hard-hitting array of ship weapons.

English.Name: Gallenson Tactical Systems
English.Description: This Earth-based company is responsible for hard-hitting array of ship weapons.

Localization.Name: YellowJacket GT-210 Gatling
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: Gallenson Tactical Systems
Item Type: Ballistic Gatling
Size: 1

While the GT-210 YellowJacket may be small, it packs a mighty sting. This high-speed ballistic weapon is perfect for targeting smaller, more mobile targets and its DTX-8 ammo supply system almost completely eliminates weapon jams due to bad rounds.
